about_the_game:
Forest Walk is set out in a distant mountain where the vegetation outnumber the people hiking on its winding path. A middle aged man named Rick has more to worry about than just a bad back as he climbs to the summit of the mountain. Choose to talk, befriend, ignore, or annoy the people you encounter along your journey.

Each individual met while traversing up the mountain has multiple dialogue options with each decision having an outcome influencing the individuals story. With varying outcomes, each playthrough can result in different endings.

Features:
- Multiple Biomes: Up to 5 biomes from the verdant forests to chilly summits.
- Wide Cast of Characters: Encounter up to 25 unique characters with each having unique ways to interact with them.
- Branching Paths: Choose how others view you with over 300 unique decisions and 25 character endings.
- Another Go: Reset your current playthrough to experience the world different through a perspective and achieve endings missed.

So what are you waiting for? Get ready and start hiking to see where your journey will take you.

name: Forest Walk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Forest Walk is a game about influencing characters met through dialogue, actions, or items obtained. With branching dialogue paths and outcomes, you can choose to help or ruin those around you as you climb to the top of the mountain.
